externalPassword: This should be the same password as the one thats in the daemon config.json (This is how they talk together)

pterodactyl.hosturl: Your pterodactyl panel. dont forget the https

bot.missing_permission: You require the `{PERMISSION}` permission to use this command.
bot.callbackURL: callback url after logging into the site. should end with /api/callback

channels.ticketVC: Vc Channel ID Lists the number of tickets
channels.botsVC: Vc or channel ID Shows how many bots are in the server
channels.totalMembersVC: Vc or Channel ID to show how many members In total there are
channels.membersVC: VC or Channel ID To show how many Humans there are
channels.staffVC: Vc or Channel ID how many staff are in the server
channels.serversVC: Vc or Channel ID It shows how many servers are being ran on the host
channels.clientsVC: Vc or Channel ID it shows how many people are registed to the host
channels.boostsVC: Vc or Channel ID shows how many people have boosted the server
channels.requestsChannel: Channel that request are in. This isnt used yet but will be soon

tickets: The category ID tickets will be made
categories.accountCreation: The category ID in which the channels to create user accounts will be made

roles.staff: Staff role ID (Used for staff commands)
